events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I want to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m Sarah and I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, may I ask for the order number and the reason for the refund request?
My order number is 123456789 and I want a refund because the product did not meet the description on your website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to ship the item back.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. Please send me the label as soon as possible.
The return label has been emailed to you and your refund will be processed once we receive the item in our warehouse.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if you need any additional assistance with your refund.
The refund has been successfully processed, and your case is now closed. We appreciate your feedback and hope to serve you better next time.
